name: retro-syntax
readme:
# [Giulio Procopio][1]'s Atom Retro Syntax Theme

This is essentially vendored from [Melina Donati's][2] [90s-tshirt-syntax][3], however some things didn't sound like they were right. For example, reducing font size of comments causes columns missaligning and preferred line length basically blows up. [1]: https://github.com/Giuppox [2]: https://github.com/melinadonati [3]: https://github.com/melinadonati/90s-tshirt-syntax ## Installation You may both use Atom graphical package manager and `apm` for installation. ```bash apm install https://github.com/Giuppox/retro-syntax.git ``` Check out also [atom.io][4] for installation. [4]: https://atom.io/packages/retro-syntax
